price: Za sve što potrošite ili se zavjetujete Allah, sigurno, zna! A onima koji su nepravedni nema pomagača!
arabic: وَمَآ أَنفَقۡتُم مِّن نَّفَقَةٍ أَوۡ نَذَرۡتُم مِّن نَّذۡرٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُهُۥۗ وَمَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ أَنصَارٍ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā anfaqtum min nafaqatin aw nadhartum min nadhrin fa-inna al-laha yaʿlamuhu wamā lilẓẓālimīna min anṣārin
